column2: format=Stapled calendar with mailer (13 x 12<sup>1</sup>⁄<sub>4</sub> inches)

column1: The '''''1976 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1975]]. It features art by [[The Brothers Hildebrandt]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
* ''[[The Hobbit Calendar 1976]]'', published in the UK
* [http://tolkiencalendars.com/1969_1977.html Tolkien Calendars 1969 - 1977] at [http://tolkiencalendars.com/ The Compleat Gyde to Tolkien Calendars]
